message: Interesting, although I am not quite sure what to make of it.
It certainly seems like a conversation worth having.
I suppose that black people (in America, at least) lack the privileges of education and wealth necessary to found a company.
Just so you know, most sites like HN (and indeed even Google) weight things by time as well as other ranking factors
so a brand new post with 4 points may well appear higher than a 5 hour old post with 124 points
If I look on HN right now, #5 is 12 points 1 hour ago, #7 is 124 points 8 hours ago
Another thing is that your frank language may be putting people off... "So if people are comfortable with discussing women why not blacks?" for example
I couldn't say that sentence :P not comfortably anyway
Well honestly, what issues are there? I am black but I don't see any problems
